casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Gerald Scott, Appellant.

Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s application to withdraw granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from judgment of Onondaga County Court, Cunningham, J.—assault, second degree.) Present—Dillon, P. J., Callahan, Boomer, Green and Lawton, JJ.
